moves: 1. e4 e5 2. Nf3 Nc6 3. Bc4 Bc5 4. b4 Bxb4 5. c3 Bc5 6. d4 exd4 7. cxd4
comment:
7.0-0 was the main line, but the text immediately creates a strong pawn centre
and steers the game away from better known lines.

"This move is relatively unanalysed but

I was expecting 8...
Bxd2+. The text takes me out of theory altogether so I was now playing chess.
